verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}We have heard the joyful sound Jesus saves Jesus saves Spread the tidings all around Jesus saves Jesus saves Bear the news to every land Climb the mountains cross the waves Onward 'tis our Lord's command Jesus saves Jesus saves{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Waft it on the rolling tide Jesus saves Jesus saves Tell to sinners far and wide Jesus saves Jesus saves Sing you islands of the sea Echo back you ocean caves Earth shall keep her jubilee Jesus saves Jesus saves{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Sing above the battle strife Jesus saves Jesus saves By His death and endless life Jesus saves Jesus saves Shout it brightly through the gloom When the heart for mercy craves Sing in triumph o'er the tomb Jesus saves Jesus saves{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Give the winds a mighty voice Jesus saves Jesus saves Let the nations now rejoice Jesus saves Jesus saves Shout salvation full and free Highest hills and deepest caves This our song of victory Jesus saves Jesus saves{/lang-eng}
